content:
Art. 4.236. 
Special rules 
Gifts made in the spouses' matrimonial agreement may not be contested or declared void on the pretext of lack of acceptance.
Any gift made in favour of the marriage lapses if the marriage does not ensue.
Gifts made to one of the spouses under the terms of articles 4.233, 4.234 and 4.235 lapse if the donor survives the donee spouse and his or her descendants.
